title: How to Buy Pantyhose for Men

steps.title: Look at a pantyhose sizing chart to find your size.
steps.content: Look at a pantyhose sizing chart to find your size. The first step is finding out your pantyhose size. Most brands and stores have sizing charts online. Measure your height and weight and plug the results into a sizing chart. The chart will then show you the best size for your body type. Use that information to figure out what size pantyhose you should order. [1] X Research source Use the chart for any brand you’re considering buying because sizes sometimes vary between brands. If you’re close to the borderline on sizes, go a size up. Tight pantyhose can rip and run.

steps.title: Decide if you want to wear women’s or men’s pantyhose.
steps.content: Decide if you want to wear women’s or men’s pantyhose. Since the 1990s, fashion companies have been making pantyhose specifically for men, so you don’t have to search for women’s pantyhose that fit you. It’s completely up to you if you want to wear men’s or women’s varieties. Consider your purpose for wearing pantyhose to decide which is best for you. [2] X Research source If you like cross dressing or going to drag shows, then you probably want a more feminine look. Search for women’s varieties to accomplish that. If you prefer wearing pantyhose for exercise or comfort reasons, a men’s design might be better. Men’s designs usually contain more groin support, which is better for men. If you’re over 6 feet (1.8 m) tall, you might have trouble finding women’s pantyhose that fit you. Look for specialized male varieties for a better fit.

steps.title: Order thicker pantyhose for cold weather.
steps.content: Order thicker pantyhose for cold weather. Some men wear pantyhose for working or exercising outside in cold weather. [3] X Expert Source Jordan Stolch Image Consultant & Style Advisor Expert Interview. 27 May 2021. If this is your reason, look for tights designed for the cold. There are many varieties available online. [4] X Research source You can wear your tights under shorts or pants to keep yourself warmer outside. If you’re wearing them under pants, make sure the pantyhose are form-fitting enough to fit under the pants comfortably. Thick pantyhose are great to pair with lots of clothes, including underpants. [5] X Expert Source Jordan Stolch Image Consultant & Style Advisor Expert Interview. 27 May 2021.

steps.title: Wear sheer pantyhose for less visibility.
steps.content: Wear sheer pantyhose for less visibility. Black or nude colors might stick out, which is a problem if you want to hide your pantyhose. Sheer varieties are designed to be fully transparent and see-through. This way, if your pants come up a little, it’s still difficult for anyone to tell that you’re wearing pantyhose. [6] X Research source If your legs are hairy, it may still be obvious that you’re wearing pantyhose. Consider shaving your legs if you want to keep the pantyhose hidden.

steps.title: Find a website that specializes in men’s pantyhose.
steps.content: Find a website that specializes in men’s pantyhose. Since men’s pantyhose are rising in popularity, there are some entire websites dedicated to selling them. Do a quick internet search for websites selling men’s pantyhose. When you find a pair you like, order as many as you want. [7] X Research source Other large retailers may also carry men’s pantyhose, meaning you don’t have to find a specialized website. Search other clothing sites to see if they have what you need. Make sure your size is right when you order pantyhose, since they usually aren’t returnable. If you aren’t sure, order one pair at first to see how well it fits you.

steps.title: Contact the manufacturer with special orders or questions.
steps.content: Contact the manufacturer with special orders or questions. Manufacturers that produce men’s pantyhose want to sell them! Don’t be shy about reaching out to manufacturers if you’re having trouble finding the right pair for you. They will be happy to answer any questions and help you find the right product. [8] X Research source You can also ask manufacturers if they carry other products that you haven’t seen online. You could end up discovering the perfect pair of pantyhose by asking a simple question like this.

steps.title: Order women’s pantyhose from any website that sell’s women’s clothes.
steps.content: Order women’s pantyhose from any website that sell’s women’s clothes. If you know your size and want to wear women’s pantyhose, they’re very easy to find. Visit any website that sell’s women’s clothing and order as many pairs of pantyhose as you want. [9] X Research source If you aren’t sure about your size, only order one pair at first. Try it on when it arrives to see if the size is correct. If it is, order more. If not, try another size. Pantyhose are usually not returnable, so if you get the wrong size you’ll probably have to keep it.

steps.title: Bring a woman with you if you’re buying women’s pantyhose in person.
steps.content: Bring a woman with you if you’re buying women’s pantyhose in person. You might feel uncomfortable or embarrassed buying women’s pantyhose from a store. If you want to hide what you’re doing and have a female friend who knows you wear pantyhose, try bringing her with you to the store. People will think the pantyhose are for her, and you won’t have to risk odd stares from other people. [10] X Research source Remember that you're free to wear anything you want to, and there is nothing wrong with expressing yourself. Don't let people's reactions prevent you from being who you are.
